description: Sony PlayStation 5 console - play without limits. Admire the incredible graphics and experience brand new features brought to the PlayStation 5 console. Your journey starts here! The purchase of the console is possible with a payment card Visa, Master and paypal, without the possibility of paying by check.

Experience the next chapter in the longest video game story with 32 redesigned, unique fighters. The all-new 'Heat' system is designed to crush your opponents. Enjoy graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5. With diverse single-player content such as the all-new Arcade Quest mode and an in-depth customization system for playable characters and avatars, TEKKEN 8 is the most exciting experience yet.
GET THE LATEST CONTROLLERS .You can get any controller for any console. We also have joysticks for older consoles
